description: Days of Supply refers to the amount of days where item stock is sufficient for the demand. The incoming deliveries are not considered in the main days-of-supply-equation, but they can still be included in the projection of days-of-supply for the future days.

urn_samm_io.catenax.shared.uuid_2.0.0_Uu.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the UUID is composed of five groups of characters separated by hyphens, in the form 8-4-4-4-12 for a total of 36 characters (32 hexadecimal characters and 4 hyphens), optionally prefixed by "urn:uuid:" to make it an IRI.

urn_samm_io.catenax.days_of_supply_1.0.0.description:
If a supplier provides stock information to a customer, use "OUTBOUND".
If a customer provides stock information to a supplier, use "INBOUND".

urn_samm_org.eclipse.esmf.samm_character.description: Describes a Property which contains the date and time with an optional timezone.

urn_samm_io.catenax.days_of_supply_1.0.0.description: Days of supply for a specific date.

date.description: Date refers to the specific calendar day (current or projected) associated with the measured (or expected) inventory level. It serves as a timestamp for calculating Days of Supply, indicating when the inventory count was taken or projected.

daysOfSupply.description: Amount of days, before the current stock is expected to be exhausted. Days of supply of a customer: Number of days where; (Stock) - Σ(daily Demand) >= 0; Days of supply of a supplier: Number of days where; (Stock) - Σ(daily Outgoing Shipments) >= 0

urn_samm_io.catenax.days_of_supply_1.0.0.description: List of quantity of days of supply. It MUST include at least current date and it is recommended to include future dates.

urn_samm_io.catenax.shared.business_part.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the BPNS is composed of prefix 'BPNS', 10 digits and two alphanumeric letters.
The provided regular expression ensures that the BPNA is composed of prefix 'BPNA', 10 digits and two alphanumeric letters.

urn_samm_io.catenax.days_of_supply_1.0.0.description:
This defines the number of days with allocated supply for an item stock in a given location that is available for the use in production or deliveries. 
The allocated days of supply are not available for other customers.

amountOfAllocatedDaysOfSupply.description: Amount of Days of supply of a given allocated item stock in a given location.

stockLocationBPNS.description: BPNS identifying the site the stock is located at. One stock has always one location.

stockLocationBPNA.description: BPNA identifying the address the stock is located at. One stock has always one location.

urn_samm_io.catenax.days_of_supply_1.0.0.description: Set of allocated Days of Supply that may relate to different stock locations.

materialGlobalAssetId.description: Identifier used uniquely to identify part type twin.

direction.description: Direction of the stock from data provider perspective.

allocatedDaysOfSupply.description: Days of supply that have been already allocated to the customer.
